author: Ali Gostanian
title: 106-year-old great grandmother released from hospital after recovering from COVID-19
description: Connie Titchen, age 106, is believed to be Britain's oldest patient to recover from COVID-19.
content: Connie Titchen, a 106-year-old great-grandmother from Birmingham, England, was released from the hospital this week after enduring a three-week battle with COVID-19. She is believed to be Britains oldest patient to recover from the coronavirus, according to t… [+5770 chars]
